patterns: How much can i borrow in a foreign education loan?
Max range to borrow in a foreign education loan
foreign education loan max money to borrow
borrowing in foreign education loan
What is the maximum loan amount I can get for studying in foreign?
responses: To study abroad, the maximum loan amount you can get is up to Rs. 20 lakhs.

patterns: How eligible am I for education loan?
What is the eligibility criteria for educational loans?
What are the factors considered for taking a educational loan ?
How do you determine my eligibility for a educational loan ?
responses: If you are an Indian resident/citizen, have got admission for a job oriented professional / technical courses offered by reputed universities, MBA, MCA, MS, etc, Degree / diploma courses like aeronautical, shipping, etc provided these are recognized by competent regulatory bodies in India/abroad for the purpose of employment in India / abroad.Net Banking

patterns: what expenses does the foreign education loan cover?
what expenses all does the foreign educational loan cover
Which course related expense does this loan cover ?
expenses coming under the foreign education loan
what all can i use the money for foreign education loan except courses
what non course fees are covered in foreign educational loan
expenses covered in foreign educational loan
expenses under foreign educational loan
responses: Apart from the basic course fee payable to the institution where you decide to study, the following expenses will be covered under the loan: •Exam/Library/Lab fees •Caution deposit / Refundable deposit asked by the institution / Building fund - supported by Institution bills / receipts •Purchase of Books / equipments / instrument / uniforms •Travel expenses / passage money for studies abroad •Purchase of computers - essential for completion of the course •Insurance •Miscellaneous expenses related to the course - like study tours, project work, thesis, etc.

patterns: which courses can i take for foreign educational loan
foreign education loan available for what courses
courses alloted for foreign educational loan
coures available in foreign educational loan
courses i can avail foreign education loan for
what course can be taken for foreign educational loan
responses: You can take a Education Loan for foreign education on the following courses: •Management Courses (Full-Time) •Engineering Courses •Medicine - Graduation + Post Graduation •Masters in Computer Application ( MCA / MCM ) •Architecture •Hotel and Hospitality •Agriculture •Pure Science

patterns: coapplicant needed for educational loan?
do i need a guardian for educational loan
parents needed for educational loan?
coapplicant required in educational loan
any witness required for educational loan
responses: Yes a co applicant is required for all full time courses. Co-applicant could be Parent/ Guardian or Spouse/ Parent-in-law (if married)

patterns: How long can take to repay foreign educational loan
how much time is there for foreign educational loan
tenure time for foreign educational loan
foreign educational loan repay time
how much time can we take to pay foreign educational loan
time alloted for repaying foreign educational loan
responses: The maximum tenure of the loan can be 7 years, including the Moratorium period.

patterns: What security do I need to provide to obtain a foreign educational Loan?
securities to submit for foreign educational loan
collateral to provide for foreign educational loan
collateral needed for foreign educational loan
security requirement for foreign educational loan
responses: For loans up to Rs. 4 lakh - No collateral or Third Party Guarantee is required. For loans from Rs. 4 lakh to Rs. 7.5 lakh – No collateral required, however Third Party Guarantee is required. For loans above Rs. 7.5 lakh – collateral is required. You can choose from any of the following acceptable collaterals: • Residential Property, • HDFC Bank Fixed Deposit,• LIC/NSC/KVP
